seeder = has complete copy of the torrent & sharing it with the world

Basically, you will automatically become a Seeder once you finish downloading the torrent. While downloading a torrent you are a Peer. And if you download a file and instantly remove the torrent from your client (uTorrent for example), you are then what's known as a Leecher (I like to call them greedy little fuckers who should have their internet access cut off).

So... now you know what they all are, please seed in the future. Even if its just for a few hours, it helps.

Somethings f'd up about this file. It's almost impossible to convert to a DVD. Most converters don't even see it and the one I use 99% of the time converts .05% and has to shut down. Same with the other 2 of 10 programs I've tried. Nero seems to be working but it can't remove the letterbox. I hate going through the trouble to convert it for all players and 1/2 of the screen is black. Hopefully someone will take this and use their professional abilities to make something Ultra Video Converter can work with. I've never seen such a problem and I've converted a LOT of movies. Still, I'll keep sharing 4-5 X like always for those who don't go through the tedious conversion process. TY for the upload.
